quotes.name: Audi
quotes.quote: With StoreDNA, we have a better understanding of our customer's behaviour which leads to a more optimised showroom in terms of layout and workforce.
quotes.credentials: Axel Geijtenbeek, Managing Director Audi Center Amsterdam

quotes.name: Samsung
quotes.quote: We wanted not only to get the data insights but also to apply business actions rapidly. The agility of retailers to adapt stores to the needs of their customers is a key capability
